summary: Valentino and Salvo, unemployed and in search of fortune and recommendation, leave Palermo for Valentino's home town, Monteforte, where they will try to survive the Italian crisis by opening some sort of hospice.
cast: Ficarra|Picone|Tiziana Lodato|Lily Tirinnanzi|Fatima Trotta|Ludovico Caldarera|Francesco Paolantoni|Nino Frassica|Mariano Rigillo|Lucia Guzzardi|Giancarlo Ratti|Maria Vittoria Martorelli|Lollo Franco|Stefania Blandeburgo
title: Andiamo a quel paese
